Posts.Content: DespiteEverything_ITrustThee wrote: I'm starting a hair growth thread for those who want an idea about how long it takes to grow after chemo... from 1 week post final chemo on down to almost a year out... (I did 4 AC and 11 weekly taxol) Log in to post a reply
